results.title: Bidirectional regulation of reactive oxygen species for radiosensitization in nasopharyngeal carcinoma.
results.text_hl: Herein, we propose an innovative bidirectional radiosensitization strategy for @<m>DISEASE_Nasopharyngeal_Carcinoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000077274 @@@NPC@@@. Specifically, we have encapsulated @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@) and @CHEMICAL_cupric_sulfide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C017846 @@@copper sulfide@@@ nanoparticles (@CHEMICAL_cupric_sulfide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C017846 @@@CuS@@@ NPs) within injectable DNA supramolecular hydrogels (DSH) to create a novel radiosensitizer, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@-CuS@DSH.

citations.NLM: Chen J, Feng C, Lan Y, Chen X, Peng Z, Huang Z, Wang R, Zhang W, Ye Y, Mao Z, Pan D, Yang L. Bidirectional regulation of reactive oxygen species for radiosensitization in nasopharyngeal carcinoma. J Nanobiotechnology. 2025 Feb 8;23(1):96. PMID: 39923065
